00028 #ifndef __FILTER_CPP
00029 #define __FILTER_CPP

00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00032 
00033 #include "SoundSample.h"
00034 #include "Collection.h"
00035 #include "Track.h"
00036 #include "MultiTrack.h"
00037 #include "Filter.h"

00039 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00040 MultiTrack &Filter::do_filter_MultiTrack(MultiTrack &inWave)
00041 {
00042         MultiTrack *newMultiTrack;
00043         Track *newTrack;
00044         SoundSample *channel;
00045 
00046         // create the new MultiTrack
00047         newMultiTrack = new MultiTrack();
00048 
00049         // iterate over all individual tracks
00050         // for each track:
00051         //  grab the SoundSample from inside the Track
00052         //  filter the SoundSample, which returns a NEW SoundSample
00053         //  reset the filter so that it can be used fresh next time
00054         //  create a new track based on the returned, filtered SoundSample
00055         //  add this new track to the output MultiTrack
00056     Iterator<Track*> it = inWave.iterator();
00057     while (it.hasNext())
00058     {
00059                 channel = & it.next()->getWave();
00060                 newTrack = new Track(do_filter_SoundSample(channel));
00061                 reset();
00062                 newMultiTrack->add(newTrack);
00063     }
00064 
00065         return *newMultiTrack;
00066 }
00067 
00068 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00069 Track &Filter::do_filter_Track(Track &inWave)
00070 {
00071         Track *newTrack;
00072         SoundSample *channel;
00073         
00074         // grab the SoundSample from inside the Track
00075         // filter the SoundSample, which returns a NEW SoundSample
00076         // create a new track based on the returned, filtered SoundSample
00077         channel = & inWave.getWave();
00078         newTrack = new Track(do_filter_SoundSample(channel));
00079 
00080         return *newTrack;
00081 }
00082 
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00084 SoundSample *Filter::do_filter_SoundSample(SoundSample *inWave)
00085 {
00086         int i;
00087         SoundSample *outWave;
00088 
00089         // create new SoundSample
00090         outWave = new SoundSample(inWave->getSampleCount(),
00091                                                           inWave->getSamplingRate());
00092 
00093         for(i=0;i<inWave->getSampleCount();i++)
00094         {
00095                 (*outWave)[i] = do_filter((*inWave)[i]);
00096 //      outWave->operator[](i) = do_filter(inWave->operator[](i));
00097         }
00098 
00099         return outWave;
00100 }
